founderNote.quote: "Fire has always existed, but it was Prometheus who gave it to humanity - a gift that changed everything. Technology is no different: it's already here, all around us. We're here to guide you in harnessing it, making it simple, accessible, and powerful for your business. Our mission is to turn complex tools into smart, easy-to-use solutions that help you grow, innovate, and succeed."

whyChooseUs.title: Unified Operations Platform
whyChooseUs.subtitle: See beyond the numbers. Act with precision. Grow with intelligence.

benefits.title: Real-Time Analytics
benefits.description: Stay ahead with accurate, real-time performance tracking

benefits.title: Data-Driven Growth
benefits.description: Make smarter moves with accurate, real-time cost savings.

benefits.title: 24/7 Support
benefits.description: Connect with our team instantly to get any kind of support

features.title: All features in 1 tool
features.subtitle: Discover features that simplify workflows & grow your business.

features.title: Inventory
features.description: Smart inventory for smart businesses. From prep to wastage, tracks everything in real time, predicts demand, plans restocking, and removes guesswork.

features.title: Task
features.description: Every task matters. Work smarter, together. From daily tasks to big-picture goals, keep your entire team aligned, organised, and productive. Assign, track, and manage every task effortlessly.

features.title: Scheduling
features.description: Simplify scheduling with our automated rota system. Use AI to build perfect rotas, balance shifts, predict demand, and keep your business running seamlessly.

features.title: AI Assistant
features.description: Meet Agani - your AI-powered partner in business intelligence. From insights to action, Agani helps you make smarter decisions, faster. Fire up your business with Agani.

process.title: Simple & Scalable
process.subtitle: A transparent process of collaboration and feedback

steps.title: Workflow Assessment
steps.description: We spend time with you to understand your business and your data. Then, we provide support and solutions designed to fit your needs - helping you streamline operations and achieve growth.

steps.title: Deploy with Confidence
steps.description: Deploy your systems with zero stress. We provide you end-to-end support, ensuring your processes run effortlessly and your team is empowered to succeed.

steps.title: Ongoing Support & Optimization
steps.description: With us, you're never alone. Our AI assistant, Agani, monitors your operations, provides insights, and offers second opinions to guide your growth. And our 24/7 helpline isn't just for tech support - it's your growth partner, ready to advise, guide, and help you make smarter business decisions anytime.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers have to say about their experience

testimonials.quote: Promith has transformed our workflow completely. We've saved over 20 hours per week on repetitive tasks.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: The AI automation is incredibly smart. It learns our patterns and suggests improvements we hadn't even considered.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: Best investment we've made this year. The ROI was evident within the first month.
testimonials.author: Emily Rodriguez

contact.title: Let's Build Something Great
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your business with AI-powered solutions? We're here to help. Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your restaurant and how we can help...

form.successMessage: Thank you! We've received your message and will get back to you soon.
form.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly.

notification.subject: New Contact Form Submission from {name}
notification.headerSubtitle: You have received a new inquiry from your website

confirmation.subject: Thank you for contacting Promith
confirmation.title: Thank You for Contacting Us!
body: Thank you for reaching out to Promith! We've received your message and our team will review it shortly.
We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. If your matter is urgent, please feel free to call us directly.
We look forward to speaking with you soon!

hero.title:
Building the brain
for modern business.
hero.description: We believe that intelligence shouldn't be complicated. Promith bridges the gap between raw data and actionable growth, giving you the power to see further.

story.quote: "Fire has always existed, but it was Prometheus who gave it to humanity."
story.title: From Complexity to Clarity
paragraphs: Technology is ubiquitous. It surrounds us, shapes us, and drives us forward. But for many businesses, it remains a chaotic force—powerful, yet difficult to harness.

Promith was born from a desire to tame that chaos. We didn't just want to build another tool; we wanted to build a guiding light. A system that takes the overwhelming flood of operational data and refines it into a single, clear stream of intelligence.
Today, we empower teams worldwide to stop guessing and start growing. We turn "what happened?" into "what's next?"

values.title: What Drives Us
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every line of code we write and every decision we make.

items.title: Radical Transparency
items.description: We believe in open systems and honest data. No black boxes, just clear insights you can trust.

items.title: Human-Centric AI
items.description: Automation shouldn't replace humans; it should elevate them. We build tools that empower your people.

items.title: Relentless Evolution
items.description: The world doesn't stand still, and neither do we. We are constantly refining our models to keep you ahead.

team.title: Meet the Makers
team.subtitle: A diverse group of engineers, designers, and strategists united by a shared vision.

backers.title: Backed by the best
backers.subtitle: Our vision is supported by some of the most trusted names in investment, sharing in our ambition to make positive change for restaurant owners, managers, chefs, baristas and customers alike.

cta.title: Ready to shape the future?
cta.subtitle: Join us on our journey to redefine business intelligence. Let's build something extraordinary together.

metadata.title: Promith - AI-Powered Automation Solutions
metadata.description: Transform your workflow with intelligent automation. AI-powered solutions for modern businesses.
